and the reason why we want to do 
green and red chilies is because

which is what's used in the red curry

okay so you want to get it 
quite fine just like that

a little bit of skins is okay and then the most

it's got a medicinal aroma but in a very good

like chicken because it's just a basic easy to use

yes that looks good already now i'm

you need to use chicken stock for this if you are

the bones will make a stock as it cooks but 
if you're starting with boneless proteins

for maximum flavor you definitely want 
to use chicken stock unsalted preferably

okay so i'm just going to let this

so we got lots of vegetables here as this is a

if you can't get it you can use regular japanese

if possible and just the way you prep these 
super easy you just cut off the little tip

and then cut them into six or 
quarters depending on the size

and they're firm and crunchy but they do cook 
up tender and there's lots of seeds here it's

all edible so don't be afraid of that and then
